short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically play a random album from your YouTube Music™ library by clicking the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Random Album for YouTube Music™, the browser extension that brings back the joy of experiencing music as it was meant to be heard – in its entirety. Just like dropping the needle on a vinyl record or popping a CD into your player, Random Album for YouTube Music™ scans your library to select and stream a random album from start to finish.

To use, open the YouTube Music website and click the extension icon. For long listens, head to the extension options to enable album shuffle and queue up multiple albums!

This extension is open source! https://github.com/cgarst/random-album-for-youtube-music
Icon by https://icons8.com.
